website_summaries.verdict: The top brand recommended by veterinarians comes with a 2.5% DAP dose that works well for many dogs.
pros: Can work quickly, and some saw very dramatic improvements in their dog’s behavior
A complementing spray is available that can increase results when indoors
cons: As with all pheromone collars, some dogs are “non-responders,” but many saw relief of symptoms to some degree

customer_reviews.title: It's works for me
customer_reviews.text: Got a new 8 week old puppy GS, headed home after removing her from Mom and siblings she was crying,wining and jumping all over the place. Got home and put this CEVA on her and at once she totally calm down, I thought she was on drugs or something.....but knew better no drugs in this house, it is going on 12 weeks and this really works. No all night crying,no wining except when she need to go or want water and that's not thur the night.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Walker Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Just try it- your dog will definitely benefit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very anxiety prone/submissive GSD and this has been AMAZING for him! He has gone from being a timid/submissive peeing dog to happy, affectionate, and much more confident in himself and surroundings. Just needed this after normal symptoms worsened from a move and this with the diffuser combined have worked wonders! If you’re questioning whether or not to try- just try it!
customer_reviews.author: cait0917

customer_reviews.title: This made my dog injured.
customer_reviews.text: If it had the option, I would rate this no stars. My puppy got major flesh wounds on his neck. No okay. My poor puppy now needs to go to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my severely separation anxiety dog
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on my dog who has severe separation anxiety. I waited for at least 2 weeks to see if it helped it did absolutely nothing NADA Nil void. In my opinion it is nothing but a rip off plus I also bought the spray it is well did absolutely nothing and I have tried it for a month
customer_reviews.author: yazzy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't phase my grumbly dog
customer_reviews.text: 1st doubt After he sniffed it he hid under the table. He came out with no trouble after I said "let's put on this collar". My expectations skyrocketed after hearing my daughter in laws extremely mean Weiner dog used one as and it worked. All day, into the night there was zero difference with his behavior. The jury is still out on adaptil itself though since the spray hasn't arrived yet. I have a border collie/shar pei mix. The later is known for grumbly behavior and my vet recommended this among other products. I'll be trying all if I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: and the results were an amazing transformation for our dog
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the first collar from our Vetinarian, and the results were an amazing transformation for our dog . Very positive at this point. The product is supposed to last for one month, which it basically did. We then purchased the second collar from Amazon, and almost immediately we saw something was not right with our dog. She seemed very lethargic . 3 hours later she was trembling. We removed the collar and within 5 minutes she was her old energetic self again. We are at a loss as to why the first collar was such a positive experience and the second collar was such a negative experience. There will not be a third. We returned the collar to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Norman G.

customer_reviews.title: This really calmed our dog down
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has PTSD. He was attacked a year and a half ago, nearly died, and still has mental issues. He has been on meds ever since. Our vet gave me one of these collars to see if it would help him and the results are really good so far. He immediately became calmer and I have been able to reduce his meds as well. He is a small dog, but not a puppy. He's about 8 years old. He is very active and a terrific companion. This has helped him a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Geek

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful With Multi Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our new puppy and the first few minutes she had it on, our older dog did NOT like it. He was really aggressive with the puppy and we immediately took it off. As soon as we did they were best friends again. We let the older dog smell the collar later and he did not like it. I’m sure this works but if you have other dogs let them check it out first. It was definitely not a good idea for our doggie dynamic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, no help at all except to irritate dog's neck
customer_reviews.text: We were preparing for a long trip (10 hrs). My dog want to go but can't relax. Wasn't always like this but has happened in the last few years. I put the collar on a few days before we left and also purchased the Adaptil travel spray for the car. Wish I could say the products helped but they didn't. When I took the collar off he had horrible hot spots on the bottom and sides of his neck. I felt SO BAD. Thanksfully, he is healing now but I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: There are much better options for your pup when it comes to behavior control. My dog is a rescue and has had terrible anxiety since I adopted her 5 years ago. I've tried several things to help her and this is the one product that did the least. I do believe this could help on a case by case basis, but it did nothing for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cluecas

customer_reviews.title: Puppy calmed
customer_reviews.text: Not entirely sure if the puppy calmed down naturally or if this was instrumental. After 2 rough nights of crying we tried this with our 8 week old puppy (Shiba inu) and he slept through the night without a peep.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new puppy who is a bit hyper and we were having difficulty house training. I do believe it is a gimmick. In fact, I feel that he became worse.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help.
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended trying this. Not only did it not help, but after about three days of her constantly wearing it, she became more whiny and anxious that she was previously. Probably depends on the dog. Just know it's a gamble as to whether or not it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Calzon

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by UC Davis doctor treating my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in my dog immediately. Recommended to me by the behavior specialist at UC Davis treating my dog. We have been using this for four months.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew about this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have an EXTREMELY high strung puggle and this is the only product that I have found to work wonders. I bought this from my local vet which they charge $31+ per one collar. So, needless to say, I very happy with the price here on amazon and had to buy more. You will also notice the collar take effect shortly after placing it onto your fur baby. And I can attest that it does indeed last one month’s time. I notice my pupper slowing getting more nervous within that timeframe. Paws down, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Mele

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical with the reviews being so evenly weighted. Either they were 5 stars or 1 star not many in between. But after hours of my pup crying and whimpering one night, I purchased this collar. What do you have to lose? It’s money back gaurentee! It’s worth $$ to have my sleep back. The first night he cried for 7 minutes. The next night 3 minutes. And now he’s barely whining at all!! I’m a believer!
customer_reviews.author: cassie22598

customer_reviews.title: It's crap and they sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium/large. what arrived was a small to medium, up to 22 lbs. Think this will fit my 60 lb dog? But I'd already opened it so can't return the opened package. Difficult to read directions to figure out how to make it work, even if it did fit. So much fluff, so many puffery words on this damn package -pages to read through to try to get to any substance- but not one instruction that I could see about how to activate the pheromones. If I could give this less than one star I absolutely would. Do not order this crap. Save yourself the trouble. Your dog deserves better. I am so upset
customer_reviews.author: ech27

customer_reviews.title: My dog was terrified
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put this on my dog freaked out. He was hiding in the closet under a shelf (he does this when he is scared). I'd hoped the calming nature of the band would soothe him out, so I kept it on for a bit. He was so miserable. I couldn't get it off easily, and he freaked out when I had to cut it off. Totally didn't work for my dog, and really disappointed. On a side note, it had an odor that I wasn't expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This collar works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything for my dog with separation anxiety/car sickness...the shirt, the pills, the drops, ginger cookies...everything. Nothing works except this collar. She still gets a little anxious but not nearly as bad as she was. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: blueyz132000

customer_reviews.title: I don’t usually fall for these
customer_reviews.text: I feel obnoxious saying this because I don’t “fall” for these products usually — but ya know what, it worked. It was night and day. We had my 90lb pit bull for a year (hes 3) and he has easily been the worst dog I’ve ever had. I was preparing to rehome him. I was over it. A friend drunk-purchased this on my phone for me LOL and UGH it’s night and day. He’s so great now. I can’t explain it. We’re sitting next to a bonfire together and hes not biting at the flames. He’s always calm. Ah!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Love

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old rescue dog - a poodle mix - has started having anxiety at all times of day and night, without any apparent trigger (no loud noises, no separations, trips to vet, etc.) I tried the collar for 8 days and it had no effect, so I switched to the oral meds prescribed by my vet. They work better, but not completely. I used the adaptil diffuser along with the collar, and that also did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Margo R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...and maybe made things worse.
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect miracles from this product but hoped it might help my anxious little rescue dog feel a little less stressed when I leave the house, or a little less scared when someone new enters the house. We are also doing counter conditioning to help with these fears but hoped the collar would provide some additional ease that might enhance our training efforts. No dice. We saw no change at all in her fear or anxiety levels. If anything, she seemed *more* reactive to those triggers. We took it off after less than a week because it seemed to be making things worse. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago girl

customer_reviews.title: Our vet recommended this when our senior dog lost her companion of ...
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended this when our senior dog lost her companion of 13 years and we had to board her for the first time without him. The collar was easy to use. It's a plastic material and it was comfortable on her. I had it on her for a week prior to boarding but it didn't calm her. She still had anxiety during the car ride and while boarding. Nothing changed. It was worth a shot but I wouldn't it chase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mooshka155

customer_reviews.title: Seems to make a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 of these. It seems to make a difference. We have a young dog with tons of energy. This seems to bring her mind down a bit. She can focus and listen and isn't as off the charts energetic. However it starts wearing off in about 3 weeks. I replace it once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. But neat concept,
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is cool, but it didn’t do anything for our anxiety ridden girl. We did it for a full month. Maybe we have to use it longer but we only purchased one and it lasts for a month, purchasing another one when the first one didn’t work, didn’t make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older dog. He was restless, couldn't settle. He would pace & circle and try to stay very close to us at all times. We thought we'd try this collar to see if it helped at all. The change in him was AMAZING! Within a day or two of wearing the collar he had settled down. He would still prefer to be fairly near one of us, but is ok on his own. He also doesn't pace or circle anymore. He will settle down & rest! We can definitely tell when the collar needs replaced. He gets restless again. Once replaced, we have a calm dog!
customer_reviews.author: GSUMom

customer_reviews.title: If your dog freaks out when it storms, GET. THIS. COLLAR.
customer_reviews.text: The difference in my dog during storms hile wearing this collar is like night and day. As a rescue dog, we are still working on his particular behaviors and issues, however, a dog foster-mom friend reccomended this collar to us. I leave it on him for just shy of 3 months at a time for best effectiveness. It is easy to trim for sizing, too! Tip: only remove it when they are bathed/groomed. Never had much luck with his Thunder Shirt for some reason. Now, he wears this collar and his favorite sweater and no more massive storm fear! Such a huge difference in his severe anxiety. Wow! If your dog is storm sensitive, GET. THIS. COLLAR! ❤🐾
customer_reviews.author: Lillybell321

customer_reviews.title: Nope, no benefit at all
customer_reviews.text: It is possible your mileage may vary, but it was 100% ineffective for my dog. I have a 15 year old MinPin with separation anxiety that started in the last 4 years. I was hoping this would help, but sadly no benefit. I obtained some benefit with some hemp calming chews on Amazon instead.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor P.

customer_reviews.title: The box states differently than the ordering page when checking on a size.
customer_reviews.text: I will follow up at a later date if it works, but I was disappointed to see on the box that the collar comes in the small/medium collar states for small to medium for dogs up to 21lbs. When you order online(Amazon) it states for dogs under 35lbs and I ordered 2. I have 2 dogs that are between 26 and 30 lbs. I really needed this collar now and am praying that it works. My dog is a mental mess with loud noises, fireworks and worst of all thunderstorms.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom

customer_reviews.title: After 2 weeks no apparent improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time & well packaged. Dog has been wearing this “calming” collar for 2 weeks now with no noticeable difference in his anxiety level. Ordered 3 to get us through our summer road trip, so will update rating if things improve.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calmer pet
customer_reviews.text: Although my dog is still prone to anxiety at different times (this is not a fix-all solution), I noticed a difference on the first day. Our dog would startle at even the slightest movement or noise while we'd watch tv at night, but on the first night that she was wearing the collar, she was snoring and didn't budge during all of the usual triggers. During the day, she barks less and naps more typically. We replace them about every 3 months, as advised by a behavioralist, and also the day before we have people over since that is a very stressful time for her.
customer_reviews.author: slptina

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, but might work for you!
customer_reviews.text: So I work as a vet tech and i decided to try this for my boyfriends Husky after we moved into our new home. Hes an anxious guy already, but with the move and him meeting my cats he became more anxious. My boyfriend is highly against medication so I decided to give this a try on the recommendation of my trainer. I think it helped a little, but did not work fully. That is the downside of using homepathic remedies. Sometimes they work, other times they don't and unfortunately it did not work for me. Might work for others though and is totally worth a shot to try it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for 2 out of 2 rescue dogs. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I knew from the outset that this wouldn't be a miracle cure, but hoped for the best. Our Vet suggested it for our nervous senior dog who is afraid of loud noises. Doesn't work for him at all. Tried it on our slightly younger senior girl and it seemed to work. We bought her her own, but now nothing. Actually, was hoping it would at least take the edge off their fears buy wearing it. Sorry, but can't recommend. Hopefully, your dog will do better with it. As with anything else, what may work for one may not work for another. Guess that's why the manufacturer doesn't offer a guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Mellow out the Good Boy!
customer_reviews.text: How this has as average rating of 3 stars is beyond me! The older my toy poodle gets, the more anxious about being alone while I'm at work he gets. He wasn't eating, so he started losing weight. He was actually chewing on his feet. And he was so freaked out by every little noise! By the end of the day, he was like Velcro on me... Since he started wearing the collar, the nuisance barking has really improved, he's eating again, stopped chewing on his feet, and feels confident enough to chill in his own favorite bed. It wasn't overnight, but darned near. He's a happier, more mellow good boy!
customer_reviews.author: BlueFug8

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This collar has subtle benefits. Myself and 3 friends all use it on our dogs. Just when you think it's not working and take it away- within a week you see old issues come racing back and realize it DOES help. It does not replace consistency,training, etc but I have a dog that I describe as having very sharp edges to his personality and this softens those. He's able to listen better, attend to the task at hand and behave better on walks. I can tell when a month is drawing near and it's time for a new collar. Needs to be a bit snug- body heat is what makes it work. It's helped ALOT!
customer_reviews.author: holly tc

customer_reviews.title: Definitely doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Doesn’t work at all. Made no difference. Not even a tiny bit. I bought because I seen good reviews. But it’s obvious that people wanted it to work so good that they convinced themselves that it actually did. Even though it does nothing! Wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Mbprincess78

customer_reviews.title: I'm told this works for some dogs. Didn't work for mine.
customer_reviews.text: Pete is a 10-month-old rescued collie-border collie mix with a LOT of anxiety and fear issues. While there is not an aggressive bone in his body, he is fearful of anything strange or different or new, from the passing of the garbage truck outside to an unknown person visiting the house. A trainer who specializes in fearful dogs recommended--among other things--this collar for Pete. She said it worked for some dogs but not for others. I got it through subscribe and save and tried it for two months, but he acted no differently wearing it or not wearing it. If it works for other dogs, I'm happy for them. But there was no discernible difference with Pete.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Worked for friends' dogs but not mine
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 different coworkers with different breeds of dogs (medium to large sized dogs) use this and were amazed by the change they saw in their dogs. I purchased this as well as the travel spray in hopes it would help my Maltese dogs with loud sounds while we're remodeling and fireworks during July 4th. Unfortunately it didn't work for my dogs. Their demeanor didn't change at all, was still frightened of the loud noises. Like other reviews mentioned, not all dogs will react the same way towards this.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my furbaby!
customer_reviews.text: This product is working for my overly scared, barks at everything, log haired chihuahua. I saw a difference in him overnight. I have the collar on him a bit tighter than his normal collar, because it's supposed to be heat activated. My furbaby doesnt mind it at all. There is no noticable scent to it. My Vet recommended this and I'm glad he did!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy N.

customer_reviews.title: Calmed post-estrus anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My 8-month-old had a sudden onset of pretty severe anxiety that came from a combination of changes at home while she was also finishing her first estrus cycle. She got to the point of visibly trembling quite severely unless I was holding her. We were at a loss, and our former puppy trainer recommended this collar as an adjunct to help her calm down and adjust. Within a few days of putting it on, her anxiety was *significantly* improved. I don't think that this is a miracle-one-stop-fix (it takes behavioral intervention too), but it helped tremendously while my baby girl was adjusting to so many changes happening at once.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A Coogle

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for my dog. He has problems with night terrors but using this collar helps him sleep soundly and if he has a bad dream he is easily calmed down.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Crosson

customer_reviews.title: I believe these do actually work
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very bad separation anxiety. Before we brought my other dog back home, she was an absolute terror when left alone. We tried so many things and none of it seemed to work, but these worked the best with her. We eventually stopped using them after my other dog was back home for a while and we don’t have anymore issues with leaving them home alone for hours while we are at work. I really do think that these helped her get through being alone before our other dog came back home and was with her while we were out
customer_reviews.author: Amm

customer_reviews.title: Works behind the scenes!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is rather anxious and barks at any sort of loud noise and is terrible for thunderstorms. When I first got this for my dog, my family laughed at me and said it wasn’t working. After a month, I threw it out and chose not to replace it because no one else, but me, felt like it really worked. Two days later my parents asked me to buy another one because my dog was bouncing off the walls barking at every little thing and crying every day. The collar makes subtle differences, but isn’t a cure all. Definitely worth the try!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Plastic garbage
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work even a little bit. No calming effect whatsoever. My dog has separation anxiety as well as a fear of thunder. This collar didn’t help with either. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Night and Day!
customer_reviews.text: Dog has a history of trauma and related anxiety. Use of this product was night and day. She is able to relax vs stealth attacks when someone comes into her home, she is much more cordial to people and their pets she meets on walks and overall exhibits less anxiety in the home. I will continue to purchase for her as no doubt being as anxious as she was was not comfortable for her and this product relieves her anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Aspar

customer_reviews.title: Good product but improper packaging
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/29 Second time my product has came in damaged and the bag was ripped open. Update 7/11: Received my product today and the package was completely damaged that and the bag was ripped open. The price has gone up this month but the quality went down. Ordered this product because my vet recommended it. They sell it at their office for way more so I found it on here for half the price and figured I would try it. My dog doesn't mind it being on and it seems to work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Calming Collar That Works
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a two year old Boxer-mix that has a bit of anxiety when home alone too long. We used the collar for thirty days as she got to know us and it worked wonders. She was noticeably calmer in about a week. For those of you saying that it's just because she got used to us, yes that was part of it, but after the thirty days we took it off and noticed a regression as the weeks went on. We ordered a second and within a day we noticed she's calmer and more at peace.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what you pay for product
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing I liked about this product. It has not phased my dog when going on walks at all. He has been on this collar for the last several weeks and I see not change,If anything I am having to put him on two leashes.Oot of all the products I have ever received from AMAZON, this is the second things along with a bathing suit I wore one time and if faded. Getting to the point I an not liking shoping with you guys anymore other than getting my books or a fantastic brand name of an item. Would not recommend anyone getting this product. A rip off as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Super calming
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there was a flavor rating on the review section...lol....but I continuously order this collar for my dog and it's the only thing that really helps him with his separation anxiety and everything else that goes along with it. Great value for a great product 10/10 recommend for dogs with behavioral or anxiety issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chris k

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I don't always write reviews on products unless they are really amazing or just horrible. This product was a waste of $20. I tried it on our Goldendoodle who was 8 weeks at the time, and it didn't help anything. After two weeks of hoping to see results we finally just threw it in the trash and draped a sheet over his kennel to help with the separation anxiety. The only reason why I even gave this one star is because I had no choice in order post this review. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: It worked BUT:
customer_reviews.text: It made my dogs separation worse. I used this with the room scent. I could tell maybe after two days the change. He was laying around more, chilling and I’m like YAY GREAT! But goodness did his separation anxiety intensify. He followed to the bathroom & sat there & cried til I came out. He barked loudly when I tried to leave. And then would just stand there and cry. So yes I can say i did see results but they didn’t work in the way I needed.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyKia

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our pet
customer_reviews.text: We really noticed it was making a difference when we replaced it the second time. Our dog was getting anxious, so we bought a new one, and within and hour or so, he was calm again and relaxed. They’re activated by the warmth of your pets neck, so follow instructions on application. Not sure if it works on every pet, but we clearly saw a difference in our pet, and the price made it worth a try. As far as knowing when to replace them, since they’re kind of heat activated, we just had to go off how our pet was acting.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Skip, doesn't work and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Had no effect on my little schnauzer whatsoever. I suspect any effects noticeable by dog owners are more hoping it works vs this actually working. What's worse, is this collar directions state it works for only a month or two and you need to get a new one. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. W. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Effective with our beagle/poodle mix!
customer_reviews.text: Every dog is different of course, but with our two year old beagle/poodle mix Adaptil products work great! She can be a little nervous when either: no one is home, or with certain scents. We have used Adaptil products and seen that her reaction to some of the scents that bug/scare her has significantly reduced. Note, this has not completely gone away, but its been reduced enough that we don't have to watch her closely and she will handle it until the smell goes away. I recommend trying this out with your dog!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: This was a bust
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my nervous little mini-schnauzer. She didn't seem to mind, was interested. Within 5 minutes, she was repeatedly shaking herself (head and neck) vigorously and running in circles, as though to rid herself of it. I allowed this for 20 minutes. Then took it off. Showed it to her. She sniffed it, and ran upstairs. Was fine afterwards. Tried to put it on her today. She ran from me. Can't return it because I opened the sealed package and cut to fit. 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s still early, but the past two nights our recently adopted Maltese has been able to sleep in his crate without whining all night. He has severe anxiety issues but seems more at peace. Also he went on a 2 hour car ride- the way there he didn’t have this collar on and vomited like usual, the way back I found his color and he wore it and and slept the whole time with no carsickness. Worth a try definitely, and it was less than half the cost here vs pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverfae

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper here for sure
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended. Way cheaper here. My dog is 20lbs and is full grown. The puppy collar is the same size as the one recommended for her weight. Same dosages etc. Went with puppy collar bc it's cheaper. Fit her perfectly and even cut off about 3 inches. I made it for loose (but stays on).
customer_reviews.author: Josh + Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have an older golden and she is a stress case. Always has been but it is worse as she gets older. She has huge separation anxiety and I was hoping this would work. Unfortunately it has done nothing in terms of her anxiety. I feel so bad for her so I will keep looking. I've read mixed reviews and thought it might work for my dog. It might be worth a try for someone else but unfortunately not for me.
customer_reviews.author: David M Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with our lab mix
customer_reviews.text: The collar is sturdy and stayed on during the five weeks we had it on our 13-month old lab mix. There was no difference in her behavior. She exhibited great anxiety on multiple occasions and the collar did not appear to have any calming effect on her. Disappointed, but not surprised. I would suspect that it will work on some dogs but not on others, and we have one that it did not work on at all. Unfortunately, you can only find out by purchasing and trying the product. Fortunately, it is not all that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: WouldWerker2b

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be easier to remove
customer_reviews.text: I did not see any notable difference in my pup with the collar on at all. I knew it was kind of a long shot with our overly hyper little guy but the reason for the median review is because it was not easy to remove at all. There was no way to get the collar to release back off of him, almost like a zip tie where it will not back out. Was not happy that we had to cut it off if him. Scissors & a tiny hyper pup are nerve wracking to have near each other.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for moving with an anxious dog
customer_reviews.text: I already use the adaptil plug-ins for my dog with anxiety. I'm in the middle of a move, and his anxiety is of course much worse. I called the vet who suggested this along with some temporary medication. We didn't even need to use the medication as this is working really well. My anxious dog went from following me around crying, to napping in the sun like a (almost) normal dog. There is no weird scent or anything with this like a gross flea collar. I'm comfortable snuggling with him when he wears this.
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 Emma Elizabeth 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please note... I used this on my puppy and he became so lethargic and had no energy what so ever. To the point we nearly took him to emergency. Once the collar was removed within 30 minutes he was back to being a puppy. Just be cautious. Obviously my pup could not handle the pheromone overdose.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Ganem

customer_reviews.title: I do not think this helped
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about 2 weeks now on our 9 month old rescue puppy - some sort of Chihuahua mix. I do not see any modification of behavior at all, and that is combined with a lot of behavioral intervention. This may work for some dogs (especially young puppies), but it is not a magical cure. Our puppy is very scared of the world, as is not uncommon in rescue puppies. I think we will end up on medication for some amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, although a little confusing at first! It had a weird smell to it for a bit but it faded within a couple days. My dog doesn’t mind it and it doesn’t get in the way of her actual collar. My dog normally paces at night and won’t sleep most of the time. However, since we started this, she no longer paces at night and seems more comfortable overall. It’s not a miracle but combined with the right medications and/or training, this is a very helpful aid.
customer_reviews.author: Meta

customer_reviews.title: DID NOTHING TO DECREASE SEPARATION ANXIETY!
customer_reviews.text: I had very high hopes that this collar would help my dog with separation anxiety she recently developed when I leave the house (or even just the room) but it did NOTHING, unfortunately. I don't know if I got a defective collar or if it's just not effective but I ended up returning it and getting a refund, which I appreciated, but I would have much rather preferred it work and be out the money! I was really optimistic that this would help my dog and was really disappointed. Paws crossed you have better results!
customer_reviews.author: luckycheeky

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a total sham when buying it, but it was recommended by my vet for my senior dog who has anxiety at night. The Adaptil collar has been a life changer. My dog is calmer at night, and has much less anxiety than without. We always know when it is time to change the collar, because he gets more restless, then calms within a few hours of having a new collar. Great product! Make sure you buy from a reputable seller though.
customer_reviews.author: D Met

customer_reviews.title: On the fence.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for my dog... but he's a lunatic rat-sized minpin who thinks hes a pitbull. However, the day I put it on him, I went to my friends house and her crazy min-pins were very receptive to it... so maybe it works for some dogs. But it didn't work for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in buying this collar but my vet recommended it to help ease my dog’s anxiety. I adopted her a few months ago and she’s adjusted beautifully but she still suffers from some pretty heartbreaking anxiety. With this collar she seems more at ease and relaxed. She’s still very playful and happy but it’s lets chaotic now. She’s my very happy girl and I’d recommend this to anyone who has an anxious furbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Angel

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work with my dogs, but I heard so many people recommending, guess it works for some.
customer_reviews.text: I've heard in a greyhound forum lots of people recommending this collar to fearfull, anxious dogs, so I decided to give it a try. It seems it works for some dogs apparently mine doesn't respond to this synthetic ferormone whatever. I haven't seen any difference in behavior at all with the collar on. It's very easy to fit, though. Just follow the instructions. I just wish it'd done anything for my dog. I got medium /large size for my greyhound and was quite big, I don't know if small would be too small,but greyhounds have slim necks.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog but I know it has worked for others.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all for my dog who has high anxiety levels. The only reason I am giving this 3 stars is because it considerably calmed down 2 of my friend's dogs and that's why she recommended it to me. Perhaps my dog's anxiety is too high for something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can’t say if this works or not. But our dog has been wearing it for over a week and her behavior has greatly improved. She had PTSD or something from having our new deck built and she was shaking and whining and hiding for days and days. We couldn’t figure it out. The collar seems to have helped so we will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: My dog's behavior, while not extreme, did not change one bit. I bought this for July 4th since I had to work and could not be home. I put it on him the day before. I have cameras outside so I can check on him and he was not behaving any differently than without the collar. I've left it on since then to see if it takes longer to work but it did not work on him at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best collar on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calming collar hands down. I don't smell a scent but it obviously works on my dog. I can tell when it's time for renewal because he starts acting up again. Once I put a new collar on him, he calms down pretty quickly. He's a pit bull rescue with an abusive past so he gets agitated and hyper protective at times. This collar makes a huge difference. I bought a cheaper collar a while back that smelled so strong I couldn't stand it and knowing about dogs' sense of smell, I couldn't use it on him. I'll only ever use adaptil from now on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This collar is the most amazing thing, we've had our puppy for 5 days and he's cried every night. So I googled what can be done to make a pup stop crying. I came upon your collar and decided it was worth a try, when it arrived we put it on our pup. That night he was So quiet and calm and slept thru the night and has done so every since. I so love this Adaptil collar and will but more. I've told several of my friends about it. Kudos to you.❤👏🐶
customer_reviews.author: F. Niblett

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I foster dogs and my latest foster had HORRIBLE separation anxiety to the point he was destroying curtains/ shades furniture. It seemed he was literally bouncing off the walls. I was told to purchase this by a friend. It took a couple days however I noticed a significant change in the dog as he was calmer. He even calmed down enough that when he found his furever home I was sad to see him leave.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: My dog is doing better
customer_reviews.text: My dog has severe anxiety and I was desperate to find something that would help him, because his constant barking was driving us both crazy. It took about a week to see a major difference with the Adaptil Collar, but it's really helping! We're both relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: No difference at all
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 year old schnauzer/Brussels rescue and his has high anxiety. Growls and barks all the time. If we have company it’s even worse he paces and growls and whines. This collar has been on him over a week and I have noticed not 1 change for him. So this collar is a no go for us. I’ll leave it on another week N see if it just takes more time but highly doubt it will help him!
customer_reviews.author: mm5702

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective Product
customer_reviews.text: Following the directions to a T, this collar doesn’t work like it’s said to. My pup has not shown any changes in behavior or mood. To be sure, I had her wear it for over two weeks and still no change. The collar is sturdy and durable. The strap is adjustable and thick. The collar smells okay, but isn’t worth the buy in my opinion. I bought some calming drops and those work much more effectively. I won’t be buying this collar again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Caused irritation, didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: The first day or so it seemed to work, maybe... But after a couple of days I noticed my dog was scratching almost constantly. Turns out the collar had irritated her skin so much her hair was falling out and it was red and swollen. I bought the spray too and now I'm afraid to use it because I don't know if it was just contact irritation or an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Comynara

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: My dog (50lbs) gets scared during fireworks. I just used it for July 4th week and it was a miracle. After putting it on her, it only took a minute maybe two for her to lay down quietly and then fall asleep. She wears the medium/large. I put it on her tighter than I do her regular collar. I keep it snug enough to touch her skin with only room for one of my fingers underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Every dogs reacts differently, did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My trainer swears by these, but it did not work for my dog. Arrived as advertised and on time. My dog actually got a rash on his neck, but it may have been from kicking at it. Just go in open minded and understand that it may or may not work on your dog but worth a try! I'm still giving it 4 stars because it does work for so many and arrived as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: This had no noticeable effect on my pup’s behavior, and once you put it on, the collar is not removable or adjustable. As your puppy grows you will have to cut it off instead of being able to make it a little bit larger, presumably so you’ll have to buy another larger one. It also took a long time to ship, so maybe he was already feeling comfortable by the time it got here.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry, perhaps this works for other dogs, but for our dog it didn't do anything at all. I took it off and threw it away after about 2 weeks. What did seem to work though was aroma therapy. When our old dog would get to barking , we just put a few drops of lavender oil. That worked much better. Like I mentioned, maybe it is a good product, just did not work for us like the Lavender iol did.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog itch
customer_reviews.text: The collar did seem to reduce our Lab's anxiety somewhat, so we subscribed for monthly replacements. After he'd worn the third collar for a few days, he started scratching incessantly. Thinking it was allergies, we tried an anti-itch bath and then Benadryl. Nothing helped until we took the collar off three days ago. He has scratched much less since then. The collars were always loose enough that we could slip several fingers under it, and he did not get a hot spot from it.
customer_reviews.author: Pati Maier

customer_reviews.title: Tried & tested by many greyhound parents including me!
customer_reviews.text: My greyhound has started to develop some nervousness due a neighbor dog developing separation anxiety. The neighbor hound is kennelled outside and howls and cries. My greyhound is very empathetic, which makes sense, she’s my service dog. The nervousness was interfering not only with my girl’s state of mind, but her ability to do her job. The Adaptil collar has worked great! She’s back up to speed. I know many greyhound parents that use them as a drug free way to help solve issues.
customer_reviews.author: SHDYoda

customer_reviews.title: It has helped our dog so much
customer_reviews.text: Our dog who is 10 has always been scared of loud noises. Our vet recently told us about Adaptil, and I was skeptical and understand it doesn't work for all dogs. However, it started working almost immediately for our dog. While he still does not like storms, he doesn't shake endlessly and overall is able to weather the storm much better than he used to. It also has not changed his personality at all. If anything, he seems more playful/happy. We are using them regularly now and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my dog from 'marking' in the house!
customer_reviews.text: I have an un-neutered male dog that has been marking his territory in the house for years. We've tried everything to stop this behavior (aside from having him neutered), but nothing has worked! After reading online that DAP collars may help, I figured it couldn't hurt to give it a try. He went from marking several times a day to ZERO. He has not done it one time since putting the collar on him. Beyond happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, next
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this an overly generous 2 stars. My dog was very intrigued by the collar when I took it out of the package. His nostrils flared as I brought it closer to him - something was definitely registering. But as soon as I put it around his neck, it was back to misbehaving as usual. The collar unfortunately had no effect whatsoever on him.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for us
customer_reviews.text: This collar didnt work for our high anxiety girl. I had it on her for 4 weeks and noticed no difference at all. I had the collar snug, as recommended but that gave me anxiety because it was tighter than I'd like, in an effort to ensure it would be against her skin. That's too tight in my opinion so I should have passed on this before dishing out the money. I've been desperate to find a solution though a d thought I'd give it a try. Sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K Levang

customer_reviews.title: More positive response than expected...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 1/2 year old German Shepherd service dog. Luci. She is extremely protective of our yard. She would bark at any and everything that came near the yard. Several nights ago a loud and very close thunder storm came through...I was at my wits end...then I remembered the Adaptil Calm Collar...amazing. She has had it on ever since..(three days) What a transformation..can not believe the positive response I am getting from her now!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dog has had this collar for about 2 days and no change in his behavior or anxiety around visitors (knocking on the door), thunder, or my phone ringing. I have a 5-year old neutered Saint Berdoodle. He was neutered when he was 2 years old, so he is definitely stuck in his old ways, but I was hoping for calmness for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: So, when I bought this product I was skeptical. I really didn’t have high hopes but I figured it was worth a shot. Within only a few hours of putting the collar on my thirteen year old papillon, he stopped his nervous vibrating. He still licks at himself more than I would like- but his shaking has stopped and it seems as if his anxiety has been halved. I’m so impressed with this product- best purchase I have ever made for my pets!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: We have a crazy, scared, fearful, anxious, rescue cattle dog mix. She has been on prozac for a while and the vet suggested adding this to help calm her anxieties. We did not notice a difference using it for 2 months worth. I have heard from friends that it has worked for their dogs. Ours may just be a little tooooo past help
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1983

customer_reviews.title: Shocked with how well this product works!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly shocked and amazed at how well this collar works! Our puppy has been super anxious since we adopted him. He’s been trying to adapt to his new home. He was constantly whining, crying, and howling. After we put the collar on him he slept in his crate during the night with no whining. We are amazed! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This product works for my shelter rescue dog. She is very anxious and has severe separation anxiety. Vet recommended and we purchased from the Vet office (don't do that ...Vet charged me $45.00 and its on Amazon for $12). Just purchased again for replacement. Ours did not make it a full 30 days as advertised so make sure to order a week early. I noticed a huge difference in behavior at about 25 days in...got the collar put it on and she mellowed out again. Also bought the plug-in diffuser to try as well this month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One out of two isn't bad! its hard to say whether or not its ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 collars (i have 2 dogs , recently adopted), on the recommendation of our trainer. They go nuts when we leave the house, and One has accidents (the puppy). The puppy (8 months) wears it, the other dog (8 yrs) somehow got it off and chewed it up. One out of two isn't bad! its hard to say whether or not its really working yet, but in combination with some training... we have seen a small improvement over the past week shes been wearing the collar. We had been doing just the training alone , but recently added the collar about a week ago with some visible improvements. I think its helping.
customer_reviews.author: Jme D

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS honest to God
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 yr old golden retriever is deathly afraid of fireworks. They go off illegally for weeks before and after July 4th. So I purchased this a week or so ago, and it has worked wonders. NOT every single time, but I would day a good 98% of the time, she doesn't even react to the boom!! It's a great product and I will be back for more. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Product works well for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This was a first try at the small dog version of this product. I had successfully used the "junior" one, but the price was like twice as expensive. This one worked perfectly. Our dog calmed down immediately after changing out the old collar. Really quite remarkable. Based on other reviews, it may be specific to the dog so it would be worth trying one out before committing to a bunch of these. Our vet gave me one of the junior versions to try and it worked well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Geek

customer_reviews.title: No help collar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog that is scared of thunder, firecrackers, gun shots, etc. I wanted something other than the pills from the Vet. This collar did absolutely nothing to ease his anxiety when we had a thunderstorm, or when July 4th came and fireworks were going off in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyrella

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a GSP cross. Highly active and very anxious. I have tried everything. This collar did not work. I have tried drugs from the vet - daily dosing as well as "for the moment" drugs, A-paw-thecary drops, calming wafers, etc. I have tried them separately and tried various combinations. The most effective is to keep him exercised and use a blend of essential oils. The oils alone do not work. This collar with exercise did not work.
customer_reviews.author: tymr

product_meta.title: Adaptil Calm On-The-Go-Collar for Dogs (All Sizes ) | Constant Calming and Comfort Everywhere (Packaging may vary)
product_meta.description: Size:Medium/LargeIs your dog barking excessively? Are they pacing, panting, whining or hiding on a regular basis? These behaviors may be caused by fear and anxiety. ADAPTIL is a vet recommended, clinically proven, drug free solution that helps your dog feel calmer. The ADAPTIL Calm On The Go Collar provides “comforting messages” (dog appeasing pheromones that mimic a mother's nursing pheromones) that helps dogs feel calm and relaxed in situations like loud noises (thunderstorms and fireworks), being home alone, traveling or other fearful situations. These odorless messages are only perceived by dogs and provide a strong signal of security and comfort. By making your dog feel relaxed and less stressed, it helps to reduce problem behaviors. Cats and people are not affected by these pheromones. The collar is easy to use - all you have to do is put the collar on your dog, and their body heat will activate the calming pheromones to help your dog feel calm all day. Each collar will last up to 4 weeks, and should be replaced around that time for maximum effectiveness. The collar should be removed during grooming and bathing, but other than that, your dog can safely wear it at all times.
feature_bullets: VET RECOMMENDED: Adaptil is the number 1 Vet Recommended solution to help dogs adjust to challenging situations and curb stress related unwanted behaviors
CLINICALLY PROVEN: May be used to help reduce separation anxiety and fear of loud noises (thunderstorms/fireworks), increase focus during training sessions or adapt to new surroundings
DRUG FREE SOLUTION: Adaptil helps your dog feel calm and comfortable by mimicking a mother’s natural nursing pheromones - 100% safe and drug-free.
STOP PROBLEM BARKING, destructive chewing, trembling, fear of loud noises, separation anxiety, and many other "not-so-fun" symptoms your dog may display

EASY TO USE: Simply put on your Adaptil Calming Collar, and you are good to go. Your dog's body heat will activate the calming pheroemones, which will help your dog to stay calm all day long, regardless of the situation

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
